category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDVCreateSCOForClearance
preference.preference_description: Defines if real-time clearance analysis results are stored for subsequent retrieval. Valid Values: TRUE - An SCO (structure context object) containing clearance analysis results is created after real-time analysis is complete. FALSE - An SCO is not created after real-time analysis is complete.
